categories.name: Farkle Lovers
categories.reasoning: Make farkles beneficial - earn points, money, or other rewards when you farkle

categories.name: Farkle Protection
categories.reasoning: Prevent farkles or reduce their impact - keep scores, get second chances

categories.name: Face Changers
categories.reasoning: Modify dice face values - change what numbers appear on this die

categories.name: Score Boosters
categories.reasoning: Multiply points and money - boost your scoring potential

dice.name: Phoenix Die
dice.effect: When you farkle, score half of your current turn score instead of losing it all

dice.name: Back Luck Die
dice.effect: If you Farkle and have 1 or less dice saved, score 1,000 points

dice.name: Gambler's Die
dice.effect: If you farkle, automatically bank your current round score (risky but can save big rounds)

dice.name: Daredevil Die
dice.effect: Each farkle this turn adds +200 to your next successful bank (stacks)

dice.name: Cushion Die
dice.effect: When you farkle, keep half of your current turn score

dice.name: Parachute Die
dice.effect: When you farkle, automatically bank your current round score (loses turn score)

dice.name: Lucky Die
dice.effect: One face (6) is replaced with a 5, making this die more likely to score

dice.name: Heavy Die
dice.effect: 2s are replaced with 1s - more scoring opportunities

dice.name: Hot Die
dice.effect: Each time you score this die, then roll, gain +50 points

dice.name: Jackpot Die
dice.effect: 2x your score earned when scoring this die.

dice.name: Triple Die
dice.effect: Triples the points earned from this specific die (1 = 300, 5 = 150)
